impact-statement: Light absorption by the algal transcription factor Aureochrome 1a causes dimerization at the light-oxygen-voltage (LOV) sensing domain, which has implications for the design of synthetic photoreceptors for optogenetics.

aff1.institution: Max Planck Institute for Medical Research

contribution.con1: UH, designed the project, performed and analyzed the experiments, solved the <italic>Pt</italic>Au1a<sub>LOV</sub> crystal structures and wrote the manuscript
contribution.con2: IS, supported design of the project and gave advice during preparation of the manuscript

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.

par-3.institution: Hartmut Hoffmann-Berling International Graduate School of Molecular and Cellular Biology
